title: Dialogue 1
raw: ウチの会社一度潰れているんです。。。
translated:
Our company is on the verge of bankruptcy...

****come check this later

title: Dialogue 3
raw:
以前はスピーカーやプレーヤーなども作っている

総合メーカーだったんですが
translated:
Before we made speakers, players(amps?), and the like

We were a comprehensive maker (producer/manufacturer?), but

title: Dialogue 4
raw:
１９９６年に

オーディオ不況のあおりを受けてしまって。。
translated:
In 1996

We received a devastating blast from the audio recession

title: Dialogue 5
raw: 。。。その時はさすがに私達も意気消沈してしまいました。。。
translated: ...at that time, as one would expect, we became disheartened...
